website_summaries.verdict: A good option for a mid-size salt lamp with unique character. An appealing appearance and mood-enhancing light make this salt lamp a good buy.
pros: The natural salt and handmade design means that designs can vary greatly, giving you an original piece
cons: Depending on the size and shape of the salt, the light may be more concentrated in one area

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I was very skeptical at first about this lamp. It seemed impossible that a block of salt can have so many positive effects on so many different aspects of a persons mental and physical wellbeing. I am here to say I am a believer. I suffer from seasonal depression and I'm a night shift worker. This lamp works miricals. I've felt more energized and more well rested. My mood is much more happy and my body feels much better. Also this is a beautiful lamp. The pictures don't do it justice and it fits perfectly on my bedside table. I live the dimmer feature so I can decide how much light it emits.
customer_reviews.author: THRIFTY SHOPPER 91

customer_reviews.title: I had my doubts, but this is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It has made such a difference in my life. It really does stabilize energy. Being around my light makes me feel so much comfort and peace. If I could afford a "house size" rock, it would be in my home right now. I am going to order two smaller ones, for my bedroom and for my office.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy on this Himalayan Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to using this Himalayan Salt Lamp in our home. It came with no problems with packing and shipping. I read many reviews before ordering this. Cost was a consideration and I feel that this is a good buy. I will update this review if needed after I have used it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great. Real Salt. Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Lol I cant do this review about longevity, BUT it is real salt. Got them in the mail today, couldn't believe how heavy they were set them on the counter till I was ready to place them... My husband came home and he says, "What are those? big rocks made of salt?" Before I had a chance to respond... YUP he licked them... He exclaims, "Yup! Thats Salt Alright! Very Salty!" I laughted and explained to him they are lamps... he thought they were really cool.. so as long as the husband loves them and they look nice and are real salt lamps thats what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jess

customer_reviews.title: Soft soothing light... serene.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, peaceful glow. This lamp has a dimmer toggle and at its lowest setting, it gives off a very soothing glow. When you turn it up, it gets rather bright. The salt is beautiful, heavy, large chunk of rosy pink salt... and when you turn it on, it has this soft amber light... I’m really enjoying it. Wish I’d bought one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Both large and comparable in size but very poor craftsmanship. The wooden base on both of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Both large and comparable in size but very poor craftsmanship. The wooden base on both of the lamps are not centered making it very easy to fall over and one has a chunk of salt missing from where they screwed the base too close to the edge. Overall not very happy with this product and probably won’t buy from again
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but I am not sure it is real. I read that the salt sweats, but mine hasn't. Also, I feel no different with or without using it. Very nice night light though.
customer_reviews.author: mom2adopted

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package everything looked ok until I took the wrapping off the lamp. It was broken in half with bits and pieces in the wrapping. I rewrapped it and sent it back. I was very disappointed because it looked like it would be a perfect addition to a guest room. I think I'll look for one in a local store so I don't have to worry about it being broken in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ride2Up

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Nice cut to the salt - looks really nice, and having a dimmer switch makes it that much more versatile. I don't know about the science behind the negative ion stuff, however the lamp has a very soothing and calming effect. We love it, it's been on 24X7 since it arrived - no issues.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: It was tall but thin and the carving was poor quality. I had purchased another lamp at a ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp did not meet my expectations. There was a big piece chipped out of the salt crystal where it was attached to the base. It was tall but thin and the carving was poor quality. I had purchased another lamp at a local store for half the price and twice the quality. Disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They could have been packaged better, because a piece of the wood base and some of the salt broke off during shipping. Other than that, they give off a really nice adjustable glow. One lamp is thicker than the other, so it’s more orange than the other. Not a big deal really. For the price, I’m happy with them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TeeB

customer_reviews.title: A great gift and real salt
customer_reviews.text: I love Himalayan Salt Lamps. I had one that I bought a few years ago that I absolutely love. This one I got as a gift. My parents love it. My mom really wanted one but I didn’t want to spend the high price for one at the store. I scored this one for less than $20.00. The only downside, the light is a bit dim, but it’s a salt lamp so that doesn’t matter at all. I highly recommend this product. Especially as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but came with broken light bulb
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a broken bulb. I decided to keep it because I love the shape and the look of the salt lamp. I bought fairy string lights, I rolled it and stuck it inside the lamp and it’s so beautiful at night. With the string lights, I’m able to use the glow feature so it looks like fire inside the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Bulb Came Shattered
customer_reviews.text: Lamp looks nice but bulb came shattered and because it was a Christmas gift for someone we wanted to be able to take it home with them my husband is currently working to get the remaining bottom portion of the bulb out. Because the bulb was shattered we also cannot see what it looked like for purposes of replacement and will have to guess as the booklet that comes with does not specify. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but seems like family allergies are at a minimal
customer_reviews.text: We leave it on all the time, but dim it at night. It just gives a warmth to it. Whether it works or not.....don't really know.....but seems like family allergies are at a minimal. Might be the rains.....
customer_reviews.author: D. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks.
customer_reviews.text: What a rock ! Works perfectly, nice dimmer. Surprised at the size of it. However, Amazon just threw the lamp in a shipping box, no packaging to prevent damage, it's a good thing it's a durable item.
customer_reviews.author: Original 2 Cups of Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant, soothing & calming lighting
customer_reviews.text: Provides a very pleasant, soothing & calming lighting to the room. Not sure about air quality yet; it hasn't had enough time to throughly take effect but I do notice some form of change for the better.
customer_reviews.author: NRR0710

customer_reviews.title: Nice Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice salt lamp. I keep it on at night when I get home from work. I like the dimming feature- it's perfect for when I'm going to sleep. The one con is that mine arrived with a chunk out of the wooden base. It still works, but it would be nice if the base was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to give as a present and it ended up being late and damaged so I do not feel comfortable giving it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: After arriving late product is also chipped. I bought this to give as a present and it ended up being late and damaged so I am not comfortable giving it as a gift. I've decided to use the lamp myself and must admit that since I've turned it so the chip is not easily seen it is lovely and it could be my imagination but the room I'm using it in "feels" better somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.text: Good product! 5***** Customer Service!!! Product came with a broken light switch. Emailed Low_Baller, they busted their butt to get me a new one. Will recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: HNTNBTCH

customer_reviews.title: Salt Lamps for the Win!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for 2 salt lamps. I already had one in my room, and now I'm able to add one in my son's room and my niece's room. Perfect for a night light!
customer_reviews.author: Karabella Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered super fast, everything worked fine from the start
customer_reviews.text: Much more than I expected! It was delivered super fast, everything worked fine from the start, and it's bigger and better looking than I could have hoped for. Not going to say for sure that it is a magic lamp but I will say that since using it in the bedroom, my husbands allergies seem much better. He doesn't wake up stuffy and he doesn't snore at all anymore. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Brock

customer_reviews.title: Bulb came completely shattered- I had to clean up a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bulb came completely shattered- I had to clean up a bunch of glass before I wrapped it as a gift. Packaging was not good- there was a bunch of loose salt in the package and obvious scratches all over the wooden base.
customer_reviews.author: vernofguam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but there appears to be a short in the cord.  Rather disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Having some issues with the power on this. It turns on, but after a few minutes just shuts off. If I move the cord, it will turn back on. Thinking there is a short somewhere but I'm not really qualified to mess with it. May have to take it somewhere to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: db2haacker

customer_reviews.title: saying it tastes just like salt.
customer_reviews.text: gift for my wife, light bulb still comes on after 4 months, kids keep licking it, saying it tastes just like salt.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Lack of quality with base, lamp and cut salt shape.
customer_reviews.text: This is, unfortunately,the lowest quality salt lamp I've ever purchased. It will serve it's purpose but I'll be finding a nicer one for our living room. The bases we're slightly damaged prior to packaging and shipping. The lamps were well padded in generic brown boxes. The lamp holder is a flimsy metal that feels like it will quickly break after a couple light bulbs are replaced. The salt shape is a coarsely cut pyramid, not the nice oval shapes of all the others we've purchased from Amazon. I will stick with familiar brands from now on for quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerStateKCMama

customer_reviews.title: Best salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this salt lamp for my husband and he loves it. We use it everyday, i love that it has a dimmer switch and i love that this lamp goid for yoyr health.
customer_reviews.author: megan p

customer_reviews.title: I just starting using it yesterday, and it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I just starting using it yesterday, and it makes the atmosphere very calm. At first I didn't know if this one was the recall that someone told me but after researching it realize it wasn't that is why I start to use it, and I will every day!!
customer_reviews.author: margaret perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these lamps a month ago for myself....I love it so much I decided to buy them for Christmas presents for friends and family members. All of them (7) arrived well packed in a timely manner.....just returned home and everyone loved their gift.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: I already have one and I like the soft glow in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad-he loves it. I already have one and I like the soft glow in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Slack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful lamp. I don't know about the supposed health benefits. It all sounds plausible, but I live in the desert southwest and I think the air is too dry here for it to work as they sat it should. I like it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Nevada Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have several Himalayan salt lamps. And while I love all of them, the two I ordered from Inviting homes definitely surpassed the others in quality packaging and ease of use after removing from the box. I'm very pleased. The lamps are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Mirth

customer_reviews.title: The salt lamp has great clarity and is perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised. The salt lamp has great clarity and is perfect size. Dimmer works great. Product delivered as expected and in good condition. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ND of FL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is incredibly beautiful! The cord is long enough to reach my plug from night stand. It has a dimmer switch so you can adjust the amount of light that you want. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Janette B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these salt lamps to add to my collection in my home. I now have a total of 28. I wait for the price to be $10 a piece or less. I have an open concept home & and place them through out the kitchen, LV/DR, & foyer. They work by square footage, so I keep adding & grouping them together. Really keeps the air clean & helps my sinus condition.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she swears it works, she keeps it plugged in on the end table by our couch and said she cant leave it on when she try's to nap because it keeps her up with energy it gives off.
customer_reviews.author: Streetglide

customer_reviews.title: This started leaking salt water. I’m not sure how ...
customer_reviews.text: This started leaking salt water. I’m not sure how but every where I put it it would leak salt water. It made me nervous to have liquid around the electric so I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Rose

customer_reviews.title: Breathe better sleep better
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has helped my sinus and allergies. I am not taking any meds as the lamp opens and moisturizes the sinus cavity. No side effects. I turn it on in the morning for about an hour and then in the evening for a couple hours. Breathe better sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this Himalayan Salt lamp, it was larger than expected and arrived in perfect condition. I leave it on 24/7 and there is a noticeable difference in the air quality in a large bedroom. I like the dimmer switch so I can turn it down to sleep. I will be buying more for other rooms in my home.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Salty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter because she was on a TV show that she was watching and she just had to have one. It is superheavy high-quality and has the cutest glow in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than i though. I love it the brightness is also adjustable. shipping time great too.
customer_reviews.author: Om girl

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it does that but I love it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and looks lovely. I bought this for the possible benefits to purify the air. Not sure if it does that but I love it anyway. This is a light I can leave on at night at it doesn't disturb my sleep. I'm so used to it now and the glow it gives off is soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kmelz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work from the start!
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to receive this. My son has had a hard time falling asleep ever since he turned five. Opened the box and everything looked great. Plugged it in, didn't work. Tried different outlets and still didn't work. Returned already.
customer_reviews.author: Trickybutterfly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift for my niece and nephew and they absolutely love them. They love the fact that they can dim or make them brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Lamp arrived with broken resistor
customer_reviews.text: Lamp arrived on time and looks great, but the resistor was broken in half and not repairable. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Colton

customer_reviews.title: Bummer...
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing was beautiful. Loved having it on in the evenings within view, but it one day just stopped working. Thought it was a burnt out light bulb but even with a brand new bulb it didn’t work. Now I just have a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and positive lamp. Love the light it gives and the fact it has a dimmer. It creates a lovely, calming atmosphere. Have gifted one to a friend too!
customer_reviews.author: Anouschka

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful salt lamp! The quality is exceptional and the price is reasonable. I purchased three lamps this year as gifts and each one is unique and beautiful. They are the perfect size and the dimmer switch is a wonderful feature. They were packaged securely and areived in perfect condition. Now I need to buy for for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my new salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new salt lamp! Bulb that it came with was in pieces when I opened the package which was really irritating. Other than that I'm please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: ... it sent as a gift she said she really liked it saw there was a recall on some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it sent as a gift she said she really liked it saw there was a recall on some of the salt lamps hope this was not one of them. I have gotten a couple of the salt lamps also and like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Anita King

customer_reviews.title: The lamp arrived fast and in great condition. There was no damage to the salt ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived fast and in great condition. There was no damage to the salt lamp. The cord and light bulb was not broken. It looks gorgeous turned on. Excited to get benefits from it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopCrazy

customer_reviews.title: It has a beautiful warm glow which will surely liven up the cold ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a beautiful warm glow which will surely liven up the cold days. I wish there was a warning that informed me ahead of time that the lamp produces water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love my salt lamp. It sits next to my bed. The dimmer switch is the best. It allows me to go from a lamp that lights the bedroom to a soft nightlight. I am not sure if my sleep has improved but since using two months ago I am waking up less throughout the night and feeling more rested in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the bulb was broken. Had to order replacements. When the replacement bulb was installed, it worked for two hours and the cord/plug/socket now does not work, even with a new bulb. NOT WORTH THE TROUBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, she loves it! It is exactly what she wanted. As the gift giver, I thought it was beautiful. It arrived quickly and was packaged very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Debi S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp. Beautiful soft glow. My cats and I love sitting on the couch near it..... Lol. I purchased it to help calm my little scared kitty. We all love it. Will be getting more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: becky k

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I impulse bought this and I love it! The lamp is so pretty and gives off such a nice glow. The packaging was great! Easy to use and looks sooo nice. It's an actual salt rock as well. Overall it's an amazing product!! Also it's really heavy. Probably one of my favorite purchases in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Great night light
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a night light/calming lamp for our daughter. So far it really helps with her moods. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bout these to gift and was dry satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Treyrenea

customer_reviews.title: Electrical didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and loved it. I purchased one as a gift for my sister and the electrical doesn't work. She even tried replacing the bulb. It's not worth the hassle and cost for her to return it. Failed gift :(
customer_reviews.author: auntielisa2

customer_reviews.title: bulb seems to be easily replaceable. light level is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works well, bulb seems to be easily replaceable. light level is adjustable. The light bulb was not wrapped, but was still in tact when i received it.
customer_reviews.author: breealzebub

customer_reviews.title: Great color and size!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, size and effective. I love having this in my home, it not only sets a nice ambiance, but I feel that it is working well. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 4rvwofproduct

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this salt lamp. It is a very good size for the price and I love the adjustable switch that lets you control the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s pictured
customer_reviews.text: My lamp came and doesn’t have the warm pink/orange/yellow light. The salt crystals are almost white and when the light is turned on it’s a bright white shining light, even on the lowest dimmer setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have not turned it off since I got it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time they are a really beautiful piece I love the wood accent at the bottom. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Calming light and well made
customer_reviews.text: Would buy another. Love this one. Have used it 24/7 for over two months now and it's going strong. Doesn't heat up like I thought it would. That's a good thing! Easy to assemble bulb in unit. Came well packed when shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice at first, but it ended up falling apart after less than a month. The wires just came undone from the piece that holds the light, and we were stuck with just a hollow salt crystal.
customer_reviews.author: ShieldMaidenMama

customer_reviews.title: This would have received 5 stars but I haven't even ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have received 5 stars but I haven't even been able to use it yet. The light bulb inside was broken when I got it. Once I get a new bulb, I will update this.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal La Grand

customer_reviews.title: Lasted almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a great lamp for almost 2 years, until the bulb blew. I bought new bulbs and replaced it, yet it no longer works at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift and it was exactly what I expected. It is a Himalayan salt lamp and was perfect for a gift. It includes the light bulb and the base with cord, nothing extra is needed. Just unpack it, plug it in, and enjoy. Each one is unique but all are similar in style and size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie & Doug

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Its comes wrapped really well and super heavy duty. Has a switch so you can have it as bright as you want. Set one of these up in all my kids rooms. They love them. The base was a little small, might have been better if it was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gregerson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how I can dim this product or make it bright. I leave it on all the time and adjust it to however I'm feeling. It can really illuminate a room and is nice to fall asleep to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pink Cloud
customer_reviews.text: It makes the bedroom feel peaceful, I sleep better with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Calle

customer_reviews.title: Warm amber glow
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you if I sleep better or have less dust in my house, as it claims, but the soft amber light that radiates through the textured salt block is soothing and gives a soft glow. I turn it up bright at night & soften the light to sleep. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: pcurtis

customer_reviews.title: LOVELY GLOW
customer_reviews.text: This product works, or rather lights, as designed. Whatever else it does is, I think, a matter of opinion or imagination. Which is to say whether or not it makes air any cleaner or ionizes the zone it is in is speculative.
customer_reviews.author: Pleiadian7

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised . . .
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful addition to our bedroom; the warm light is lovely, and I'm assuming that the negative ions are doing their job.
customer_reviews.author: Normi

customer_reviews.title: Works as a lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is as advertised and works fine as a lamp. I wrestled whether to give it 4 or 5 stars because I haven't noticed any sleep or health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect salt rock lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I've now bought 3 of these -- for myself and as gifts. They look just like the much more expensive salt rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Hachi88

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! And a warm healing light, and energy to my Massage room!!! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Mary O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product perfect size just like description received right on time will buy again give stars. Fantastic price for size
customer_reviews.author: kv

customer_reviews.title: Has to replace
customer_reviews.text: The wiring was stripped and ripped out of the bulb socket. It's surprising I wasn't electrocuted when I plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Govis

customer_reviews.title: Delivery sucks
customer_reviews.text: It came broken and I had to return it. I did not like the quality either bought one from a Home Depot instead
customer_reviews.author: Kat Smith

customer_reviews.title: I think it works.
customer_reviews.text: Slept well the first few weeks I had it, really seemed to relax me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Southard

customer_reviews.title: great shape and color with no problems so far
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, i have had it about 1 month no problems. great shape and color to the salt, wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Duke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cool, I don't know about the esoteric healing properties all that much.
customer_reviews.author: jetpackjones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful long lasting disinfectes takes away anxiety an bad juju
customer_reviews.text: Love these I've bought multiple given few to my mom an sister's helps clean air get rid of bacteria calms your anxiety filters air, I can't get enough Himalayan salt lamps highly recommend the packages were perfect nothing broke
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Gives a beautiful "fireplace like" glow to the room. Gave one to all in my family..haven't heard how they like it. Be sure and get the dimmer switch...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: It was a little chipped up when I took it out of the box, but the lamp is still beautiful. My daughter loves the dimming feature. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice warm light! Not bright enough to be an actual lamp, but creates a lovely glow.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty nice...base is a little wobbly compared to other ones we have owned over the years. It will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but dirty.
customer_reviews.text: A salt lamp, as you'd expect but mine was dirty and had black marks on the salt. I have to position it a certain way so most of the "dirt" is in the back. I have a couple other salt lamps from a different company that were much cleaner looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can adjust the brightness! It’s beautiful in my living room and makes my home feel peaceful
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like the atmosphere it gives the room. Very soothing. It has a dimmer so can make it quite low for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: SUPER lamp! I love this design and love that ...
customer_reviews.text: SUPER lamp! I love this design and love that it has a dimable bulb. Gave to our son as a gift for his new house.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Renders

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office thinking they were small. I was very surprised when I received the package and realized they were big. I am very happy with the product and price. I gave one to my daughter for her room. Looks perfect in room and office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heard it's a great product. But the instant I ordered it's on ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got arrived quickly. Heard it's a great product. But the instant I ordered it's on sale for ten dollars less not fair. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp! Great quality and such a warm glow. I just now purchased 2 more because I want them in different areas of my home!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It makes me so happy to have this pleasant soft light and the natural salt rock. It is calming and reminds me to enjoy life's simple pleasures. :)
customer_reviews.author: music

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Screws
customer_reviews.text: Really was looking forward to giving this as a gift. Glad I opened it before just gift wrapping it up tho. The screws on the bottom were so rusted that one was broken with the screw stuck in the rock. Just hate when products give me a project instead of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley
